data.description: Join Nokia as a Software Dev AI/ML Co-op and contribute to advancing Virtualization and Cloud Computing technologies! You will work on exciting projects involving Container Technology and Kubernetes while developing AI and ML pipelines. Collaborate with our diverse global R&D team to support our mission of inventing 5G. You'll have the unique opportunity to delve into Data Analytics and Machine Learning, coding in C++ and Python, and implementing models for data pipelines, including LLMs, and LSTM architectures. Be part of shaping the future of connectivity with us!
